input.sentences: i went to visit the capitol yesterday .
there was a lot of protesting going on .
many people had made a lot of signs voicing their opinion .
i had a great time touring all the buildings .
output.sentences: We took a trip to visit Washington D.C.
There are a lot of people who wish to share their views and opinions.
Some people are very passionate about their causes.
We often forget how much tiemand energy goes into creating our National Monuments.
